column2: "You've taught me a lot! This is why we've got to go with a bang and attack in a snap!"
"It's way simpler than I thought. I think I've got it down pat now. Time to go test myself on Naberius."
"Only one thing could've been better than this: if you said there was no need for a reward because we're such good pals. Ha ha!"
"Just kidding, just kidding! I appreciate all you've done!"
